A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think Rian Johnson did a fantastic job of making an individual\, stand out\, star wars film. His treatment of Luke\, Rey\, and Kylo were simply fantastic. Although the other characters were not expanded well\, Johnson had to include them and he did okay\, not great\, but okay. Ultimately\, I'm a bit torn. This should have made a fantastic 100 minute movie but became a solid 180 minute movie.
